string.text: Old times: speak to Raven
Jackal has declared me the head of the detachment and instructed me to keep an eye on our business in the Cordon. Raven probably wants to talk to me about my promotion.
Old times: speak to Courier
Some unexpected guests have shown up at our doorstep. I need to find out what they want.
Old times: neutralize the stalkers
Our visitors need a taking out. They’ve plotted something, and a discussion with them isn’t leading anywhere good.
Old times: discuss recent events with Raven
The unknown stalkers are dead, but we didn’t manage to find out anything about their plans. I get the feeling they came here just to do. I should talk to Raven about this.
First steps: follow Raven
It seems that the unknown stalkers have nothing to do with Wolf in the rookie village, but I need to take it up with him and see Sidorovich while I’m at it.
First steps: speak to Wolf
Wolf has sent a message and says that Sidorovich isn’t available right now and that it’d be better if I speak to Wolf personally.
Missing squad: find out what’s happened with Wolf’s group
Wolf has requested me to find his group, which has broken radio contact. The group was located in bandit territory and has likely come under attack.
Missing squad: help the stalker
Only one stalker is alive at the site, and he’s wounded. He needs help.
Missing squad: discuss the details of the assault
The assault can begin, but we should discuss a plan first.
Missing squad: eliminate the bandits
The bandits need to be eliminated in order to save the captive stalkers.
Missing squad: free the captives
The bandits are all down. Now the stalkers have to be freed, after which we can return back.
Missing squad: speak to Raven
Before we leave, I need to discuss a little something with Raven.
Missing squad: speak to Wolf
I’ve fulfilled the task. I should have a few words with Wolf.
Waiting customer: speak to Sidorovich
Wolf has messaged me that Sidorovich is free and ready to take me. Time to head over there and have a chat.
Special order: place the beacon on the bridge

Sidorovich has tasked me with finding a stalker by the name of Klim and retrieving a flash drive from him. Klim is also not to be left alive. In order to find him, I need to place a beacon on the Cordon bridge.
Special order: wait for signs
The beacon has been placed. Time to wait for further orders from Sidorovich.
Special order: find Klim
Sidorovich has given me the coordinates of Klim’s PDA. Time to track him down.
Special order: speak to the hunter
Klim’s already dead, and by his corpse is another stalker. I need to find out how he’s connected to Klim’s death.
Special order: follow the hunter
It’s likely that a pseudodog has swallowed the flash drive. I need to help the hunter find it and kill it.
Special order: kill the pseudodog
We’ve found the pseudodog. Time to kill it.
Special order: extract the flash drive from the pseudodog body
The pseudodog is dead. I can now open up its belly and see if the flash drive is there or not.
Special order: speak to the hunter
I’ve found the flash drive. Before I head back to the village, I should speak to the hunter.
Special order: return to Sidorovich
Time to return back to Sidorovich and fulfill his order.
Special order: give the flash drive to Sidorovich
I’ve completed the assignment. I should give the flash drive to Sidorovich.
Special order: take the beacon in the storeroom
Sidorovich says that a beacon can help with finding Klim. I should take it from the storeroom and place it on the Cordon bridge.
Right to choose: speak to Zokhan
Zokhan has messaged me and says that he needs to talk to me.
Demanding customer: speak to Sidorovich
Sidorovich wants to talk to me about something; likely the next order.
Mercenary work: speak to Vulture about protection for the bunker
The trader has asked me to provide two able men for protecting the bunker. I should go to the vehicle station and ask Vulture to contact Jackal to spare some extra manpower.
Mercenary work: receive the order from Coordinator
Vulture has informed me about Coordinator’s arrival in the Cordon. I should meet up with him and receive another order.
Mercenary work: meet the client
Coordinator has given me the order. Time to meet up with the customer and find out about its details.
Syndicate order: speak to Raven
Coordinator has given us an order from Jackal. I need to discuss it with Raven.
Syndicate order: deal with Van
I need to find a non-lethal way to deal with Van in the rookie village. While at it, I need to be quiet about getting to the warehouse.
Syndicate order: speak to Raccoon
Perhaps a local stalker can help me with fulfilling the order: Raccoon. I should go see him.
Syndicate order: retreive the black box from the warehouse
Van’s likely to be sleeping from the booze he got from Raccoon. Perfect time to steal the black box.
Syndicate order: deliver the black box to Coordinator
The black box is in my possession. I should give it to Coordinator.
No morals: plan the assassination of Father Valerian
My next order involves assassinating the leader of the loners: Father Valerian. I’ll need to plan it carefully before making any move.
No morals: speak to Raccoon
I’ve got an interesting idea. I should speak about it to Raccoon in the rookie village, who I saved not long ago from the bandits.
No morals: tell Raven about the plan
I’ve sent Raccoon to the base by the embankment. I can now share my plan with Raven.
No morals: follow Raven
The plan is in effect. Time to return back to base and wait for Raccoon to do his thing.
No morals: wait for Raccoon’s actions
I need to wait for Raccoon to work his magic. Until then, I had better not do anything particular.
No morals: speak to Raven
Valerian has taken the bait and left the base. It’s time to take over.
No morals: kill Father Valerian and his group
The time has come to take out Father Valerian and his group.
No morals: take Father Valerian’s PDA
Valerian is dead. I need to bring his PDA as proof that the order has been fulfilled.
No morals: wait until morning
Yaroshchuk has written me that he’ll wait for me at the same place by morning.
No morals: complete the order
Yaroshchuk should be at the place he has informed me about. I can now complete the order and receive my reward.
Hot trader: speak to Sidorovich
Sidorovich has sent me a message in which he asks me to see him.
Vital package: give the package to Orest
Sidorovich has handed me a package that needs to go to Orest, the new head of the neutral base.
Easy prey: speak to Shilov
Orest has informed me that a Shilov needs help, and that if I help, the trader will pay well. It might be worth seeing this character.
Bad feeling: speak to Obscurant
Raven has informed me that Obscurant has arrived at the Cordon and is already at the vehicle station. Time to have a chat with him.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for basic work and one for fine work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for basic work and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for basic work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for fine work and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for fine work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get three sets of tools: one for basic work, one for fine work, and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for fine work and one for basic work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for basic work and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for basic work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get two sets of tools: one for fine work and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for basic work. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools
Van has asked me to get a set of tools for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Tools: bring Van tools

Van has asked me to get three sets of tools: one for basic work, one for fine work, and one for calibration. The technician will pay me for the tools and will be able to perform more advanced weapon and armor modifications.
Bar #92: speak to Shaman
The trader has told me to speak to Shaman in the Bar and help him a new problem.
Bar #92: wait for security in the Bar
Vulture has told me that getting security for the Bar will take some time.
Bar #92: retrieve payment from Shaman
Vulture has reported that the mercenaries have arrived. I should pick up the reward from Shaman and take the money for their rent.
Bar #92: speak to Vulture
Vulture needs to get in touch with Shaman and take out a few men for us. I should go and speak to Vulture.
Special order: take the items
The order has arrived. I should pick it up from Douplet.
Special order: wait for the delivery
The order has been made. I need to wait until Douplet receives it.
